casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Antonia MILLER 2PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 26, 2017

Mr. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, For Miller, Juan Antonia..

Mr. John G. Batherson, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 25th of October 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of October 2017."
